"Actually enjoyable..." - Jen Baldwin

"Legitimately pretty good..." - Dan Suter

"I saw Wargarble..." - Tom Choi

Wargarble is a part-Canadian grunge-funk band from Brooklyn. Their debut EP Discipline is available on SoundCloud. They've been funkakke-ing crowds since 2014, occasionally featuring a guy in a dinosaur suit.

When asked to describe their sound, lead singer, guitar player, harmonicassist, tromboner, and guy in dinosaur suit Will Benedict often says "It's the sound a dog makes when yelling into a sprinkler."
